subject: Re: Rsync
body:
On Fri, May 25, 2007 at 05:10:25PM +0100, Jonathan (ac3bf1) wrote:
> Sorry for the banal question...
> the debian cd syncing though rsync, does it also delete files if they are
> not found on the source mirror?
> 
> I mean, rsync synchronizes files from the source or purely downloads new
> stuff?

It depends on whether you enable or not the --delete option.

The rsync manual at 'man rsync' is full of such answers :-)

-- 
Simon Paillard


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
